name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「輪廻転生」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Reincarnation＂【#天音かなた4周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [APoXxcv37GU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata continues performing the song 'Happy People' with energetic choreography.
Performance of the song 'Oracle' (おらくる). The stage lighting and visuals shift to a more dramatic, urban night theme.
Performance of the song 'Knock it out!'. The mood becomes intense and powerful with red and purple lighting.

subtitles.original: お手もパッパッパッ
subtitles.english: Clap, clap, clap your hands too

subtitles.original: ボクに薬がイロイロハッピーピープル
subtitles.english: Medicines for me, various happy people

subtitles.original: やってみようハッピーピープル
subtitles.english: Let's try it, happy people

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh ハッピーピープル
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh happy people

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah yeah ハッピーピープル
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah yeah happy people

subtitles.original: 万歳三唱でサヨナラするね
subtitles.english: I'll say goodbye with three cheers of 'Banzai'

subtitles.original: キミがケラケラ笑うから
subtitles.english: Because you're cackling away

subtitles.original: おらくる
subtitles.english: Oracle

subtitles.original: 人、人、人で埋まったシャッター街賑わってた
subtitles.english: The shuttered street crowded with people was bustling

subtitles.original: 不安、不安、不安ばっかまた追い込んじゃったんだ？
subtitles.english: Is it just anxiety driving you into a corner again?

subtitles.original: チカチカって真っ赤な電灯　血相変えた誰か
subtitles.english: A flickering red light, someone with a changed look

subtitles.original: ブランブラン運んでった　いなくなっちゃったって　あーあ
subtitles.english: Carried away swinging, they're gone now, oh well

subtitles.original: カン、カランと空っぽになったド心棒が歌ってた
subtitles.english: The empty central core was singing with a clatter

subtitles.original: ガラッガラに空いてた駅また突っ立っちゃってんだ？
subtitles.english: Are you standing at the empty station again?

subtitles.original: フラフラっと真っ青な電送やつれ出てないですか？
subtitles.english: Don't you look worn out, wandering about so pale?

subtitles.original: ･･･あれ、あれ、聞こえますか？
subtitles.english: ...Um, hey, can you hear me?

subtitles.original: それ、吐き出しちゃいますか？
subtitles.english: Will you spit that all out?

subtitles.original: 「欠陥品」と嘲笑して「ろくでなし」と見下して
subtitles.english: Sneering at it as a 'defective product,' looking down

subtitles.original: あの日けなした怪物は自分の方でした
subtitles.english: The monster I badmouthed that day was me

subtitles.original: アンラック＆ドラッグ　望むままに成れ
subtitles.english: Unluck & Drug, become whatever you want

subtitles.original: 根本的ないい子になるまで愛したげるね
subtitles.english: I'll love you until you become a good child

subtitles.original: 大丈夫　毒で満たして
subtitles.english: It's okay, fill it with poison

subtitles.original: ブクブクに愛で肥やして
subtitles.english: Fatten it up with bubbling love

subtitles.original: 骨の髄まで　ちゃんと　奥まで
subtitles.english: To the marrow, properly, deep inside

subtitles.original: タント I love you
subtitles.english: Tanto I love you

subtitles.original: なりたい　やりたい　こっち足りないまま立派に成っちゃって
subtitles.english: Becoming grand while still lacking what I want to be

subtitles.original: 愛おしいね　かわいいね
subtitles.english: How lovely, how cute

subtitles.original: お目めに映った　有象無象が　全部「理想」
subtitles.english: The rabble reflected in your eyes is all 'ideal'

subtitles.original: 余さず　なでなでしてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll pet you all over, leaving nothing out

subtitles.original: こっちおいで　あんよが上手だね　エッホエッホ
subtitles.english: Come here, you're good at walking, yo-ho, yo-ho

subtitles.original: やったね　息が吸えたね　息が吐けたね
subtitles.english: You did it, you could breathe in and out

subtitles.original: 一人だけで　今日も過ごせたね
subtitles.english: You could spend today all by yourself too

subtitles.original: 指が上手で　口が上手で　泣いた顔も　キュンとしちゃうって
subtitles.english: Good with your fingers and mouth, your tears throb my heart

subtitles.original: なにからなにまで愛してる　すべての間違いが正しいし
subtitles.english: I love every thing about you, every mistake is right

subtitles.original: あり得ないくらい愛しくて愛しくてたまらないんだけど
subtitles.english: It's impossibly lovely, I can't help it

subtitles.original: 多分一生誰もわからないからこれからもキミの横にいたい
subtitles.english: No one will ever understand, so I'll stay by your side

subtitles.original: いくらでも　いくらでも　いくらでも　いくらでも　吐きだして
subtitles.english: Spit it out as much as you want, over and over

subtitles.original: しゃあないね　しゃあないね
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, it can't be helped

subtitles.original: キミのせいじゃないもんね
subtitles.english: It's not your fault, right

subtitles.original: しゃあないね　しゃあないね
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, it can't be helped

subtitles.original: ねんねしたいよね　もう一丁
subtitles.english: You want to go night-night, right? One more time

subtitles.original: しゃあないね　しゃあないね
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, it can't be helped

subtitles.original: 泣いても　泣いても　変わんないね
subtitles.english: Even if you cry and cry, it doesn't change

subtitles.original: しゃあないね　しゃあないね
subtitles.english: It can't be helped, it can't be helped

subtitles.original: だれも返事しないもんね
subtitles.english: Nobody replies, right

subtitles.original: アンラック＆ドラッグ
subtitles.english: Unluck & Drug

subtitles.original: もうそんな　傷つけたりしないで
subtitles.english: Don't hurt yourself like that anymore

subtitles.original: こんなバグだらけの世界になっちゃって
subtitles.english: In this world so full of bugs

subtitles.original: ごめんね　大丈夫
subtitles.english: Sorry, it's okay

subtitles.original: 安全圏によね
subtitles.english: You're in the safe zone, right?

subtitles.original: 安心な世界に行こね
subtitles.english: Let's go to a safe world

subtitles.original: 見捨てないから　ずっと　今日も
subtitles.english: I won't abandon you, forever, today too

subtitles.original: いっしょ　アンラック＆ドラッグ
subtitles.english: Together, Unluck & Drug

subtitles.original: 望むままに成れ
subtitles.english: Become whatever you want

subtitles.original: 根本的な善人になるまで　愛したげるね
subtitles.english: I'll love you until you become a good person

subtitles.original: 大丈夫　どんどん毒で満たして
subtitles.english: It's okay, keep filling it with poison

subtitles.original: ブクブクに愛で肥やして
subtitles.english: Fatten it up with bubbling love

subtitles.original: 忘れちゃうくらい　笑っちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: So much you'll forget, so much you'll laugh

subtitles.original: タント I love you
subtitles.english: Tanto I love you

subtitles.original: Knock it out!
subtitles.english: Knock it out!

subtitles.original: Ready go!
subtitles.english: Ready go!

subtitles.original: Knock it out! 熱情
subtitles.english: Knock it out! Passion

subtitles.original: 滅　超
subtitles.english: Metu-cho

subtitles.original: 先駆け撃ち最強
subtitles.english: Pioneer shooting, strongest

subtitles.original: 望まれて愛されて Get you now!
subtitles.english: Being desired and loved, Get you now!

subtitles.original: 光を魅せて
subtitles.english: Show me the light

subtitles.original: 欲しがりgame 全て
subtitles.english: Covetous game, everything

subtitles.original: 抜け駆けはしないで
subtitles.english: Don't try to jump the gun

subtitles.original: 止めないで 高鳴りに
subtitles.english: Don't stop the throbbing

subtitles.original: 鏡には つぎはぎ
subtitles.english: In the mirror, patchwork

subtitles.original: Noise 心 揺らして
subtitles.english: Noise, shaking the heart

subtitles.original: Knock it out! Knocking it out! (Yeah yeah)
subtitles.english: Knock it out! Knocking it out! (Yeah yeah)

subtitles.original: 飽きてる 自慢光
subtitles.english: Tired of the boasting light

subtitles.original: Knock it out! Knocking it out! (Hey Hey)
subtitles.english: Knock it out! Knocking it out! (Hey Hey)

subtitles.original: それフェイク はいはい
subtitles.english: That's fake, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 無敵な愛 「I」 会いたいな
subtitles.english: Invincible love, 'I', I want to meet you
